title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 340.7 - Committee chairman, secretary
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 340.7 - Committee chairman, secretary

State Regulations

The chair shall designate a member of the Podiatry Practice

Committee as chairperson and shall also appoint a secretary of such
committee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
340.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
